images.caption: Figure 1:Practical Example of TCME in Damage Monitoring:TCMEcan be used to monitor potential damage to business space while preserving privacy. The system, utilizing a pre-agreed model and prompt, analyzes camera recordings. It is restricted to output only "YES" if significant damage is detected, ensuring minimal intrusion.
Figure 2:TCMEcan be used to perform auditing of private code and models that are deployed in the TEE and participate in the ‘attestation’ that includes private components.
Figure 3:Graph coloring verification performed byGemini-1.5-Flash. The model generally has a high precision (83%) and low recall (14%).
